00007 Message::Message(int size)
00008 {
00009   realBuffer = NULL;
00010   buffer = NULL;
00011   len = 0;
00012   origine = UnknownOrigine;
00013   OriginalSize = size;
00014 
00015   if ( OriginalSize > 0 )
00016   {
00017         realBuffer = new char[size+1];
00018         buffer = realBuffer+1;
00019 
00020   }
00021 }

00060 SimpleString Message::ToString(unsigned int MaxBufferLenToWrite /* default = 20, min value = 0 max value is 256 */) const
00061 {
00062         TemporaryMemoryBuffer TmpBuffer(300);
00063 
00064         SimpleString TmpMessage = "Message ";
00065         TmpMessage       += mid;
00066         TmpMessage       += " (";
00067 
00068         if ( len < 1024 )       // less that 1 KB
00069         {
00070                 TmpMessage += len;
00071                 TmpMessage += "bytes)";
00072         }
00073         else if ( len >= 1024 && len < (1024*1024) ) // from 1KB to 1Mo
00074         {
00075                 // compute size in ko
00076                 *((char*)TmpBuffer) = '\0';     // Empty string
00077                 snprintf( (char*)TmpBuffer, TmpBuffer.GetLength(), "%.2f Kbytes)", ((float)len)/1024.f );
00078                 TmpMessage += (char*)TmpBuffer;
00079         }
00080         else    // over 1 Mo
00081         {
00082                 // compute size in ko
00083                 *((char*)TmpBuffer) = '\0';     // Empty string
00084                 snprintf( (char*)TmpBuffer, TmpBuffer.GetLength(), "%.2f Mbytes)", ((float)len)/(1024.0f*1024.0f) );
00085                 TmpMessage += (char*)TmpBuffer;
00086         }
00087 
00088         if ( origine == FromUDP )
00089         {
00090                 TmpMessage += " on UDP from ";
00091         }
00092         else
00093         {
00094                 TmpMessage += " on TCP from ";
00095         }
00096 
00097         *((char*)TmpBuffer) = '\0';     // Empty string
00098         snprintf( (char*)TmpBuffer, TmpBuffer.GetLength(), "%8.8x", pid );
00099         TmpMessage += (char*)TmpBuffer;
00100 
00101         if ( MaxBufferLenToWrite == 0 || MaxBufferLenToWrite > 256 )
00102         {
00103                 TmpMessage += "\n";
00104         }
00105         else
00106         {
00107                 SimpleString Format = ":\n%";
00108                 Format += MaxBufferLenToWrite;
00109                 Format += ".";
00110                 Format += MaxBufferLenToWrite;
00111                 Format += "s\n";
00112                 *((char*)TmpBuffer) = '\0';     // Empty string
00113                 snprintf( (char*)TmpBuffer, TmpBuffer.GetLength(), (const char*)Format.GetStr(), buffer );
00114                 TmpMessage += (char*)TmpBuffer;
00115         }
00116         
00117         return TmpMessage;
00118 }
